name: Fade of Life
description:
How to play

Steal the souls from children by sneaking up on them. Make sure they don’t notice you by making yourself invisible. Hurry up, because you will slowly fade out of existence if you don’t gather any souls.

Controls

Walk around - Arrow keys

Hide - Z, K or spacebar

If the intro cutscene gets annoying after watching it multiple times, you can skip it by pressing S.
